sen.j: 高倉 永慶（たかくら ながよし、天正19年12月2日 (旧暦)（1592年1月16日） - 寛文4年9月5日 (旧暦)（1664年10月3日））は、江戸時代の公家。
sen.e: Nagayoshi TAKAKURA (January 16, 1592 – October 3, 1664) was a court noble of the Edo period.
Nagayoshi TAKAKURA (January 16, 1592 – October 3, 1664) was a court noble of the Edo period.
Nagayoshi TAKAKURA (January 16, 1592 – October 3, 1664) was a court noble of the Edo period.
His father was Nagataka TAKAKURA.
His father was Nagataka TAKAKURA.
His father was Nagataka TAKAKURA.
His mother was a daughter of Saneki SANJONISHI.
His mother was a daughter of Saneki SANJONISHI.
His mother was a daughter of Saneki SANJONISHI.
He was the 27th head of the Takakura family.
He was the 27th head of the Takakura family.
He was the 27th head of the Takakura family.

sen.j: 官位は、正二位権大納言。
sen.e: He served as Shonii Gon Dainagon (provisional major counselor at senior second rank).
He served as Shonii Gon Dainagon (provisional chief councilor at senior second rank).
sen.cmt: 大納言＝chief councilor としました。
sen.e: He served as Shonii Gon Dainagon (provisional chief councilor of state at senior second rank).
sen.cmt: of state を補いました。

sen.j: 室は佐竹義重 (十八代当主)の娘。
sen.e: His lawful wife was a daughter of the 18th head of the Satake family, Yoshisige SATAKE.
His lawful wife was a daughter of the 18th head of the Satake family, Yoshishige SATAKE.
His lawful wife was a daughter of the 18th head of the Satake family, Yoshishige SATAKE.

sen.j: 子女に長男高倉永敦、次男佐竹義隣（よしちか、佐竹北家・佐竹主計養子）、4男佐竹義寛（佐竹東家・佐竹山城養子）、一柳直家室、中院通純室。
sen.e: Among his children, the first son Nagaatsu TAKAKURA, the second son Yoshichika SATAKE who was adopted by Kazue SATAKE of the Northern House of Satake clan, the fourth son Yoshihiro SATAKE who was adopted by the Satake Yamashiro clan of the Eastern House of Satake clan, a daughter who became the wife of Naoie HITOTSUYANAGI, and a daughter who became the wife of Michizumi NAKANOIN, are known.
sen.cmt: 永敦…ながあつ。 主計…かずえ
sen.e: Among his children, the first son Nagaatsu TAKAKURA, the second son Yoshichika SATAKE who was adopted by Kazue SATAKE of the Northern House of Satake clan, the fourth son Yoshihiro SATAKE who was adopted by the Satake Yamashiro clan of the Eastern House of Satake clan, a daughter who became the wife of Naoie HITOTSUYANAGI, and a daughter who became the wife of Michizumi NAKANOIN, are known.

Among his children, the first son Nagaatsu TAKAKURA, the second son Yoshichika SATAKE who was adopted by Kazue SATAKE of the Northern House of Satake clan, the fourth son Yoshihiro SATAKE who was adopted by the Satake Yamashiro clan of the Eastern House of Satake clan, a daughter who became the wife of Naoie HITOTSUYANAGI, and a daughter who became the wife of Michizumi NAKANOIN, are known.
